Package com.jdojo.deprecation

Class FileCopier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jdojo.deprecation.FileCopier
  • Deprecated. 
    Deprecated since 1.4. Not safe to use. Use the java.nio.file.Files class instead. This class will be removed in a future release of this library.

    @Deprecated
public class FileCopier
extends java.lang.Object
    The class consists of static methods that can be used to copy files and directories.
    Since:
    1.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean copy(java.io.File src, java.io.File dst)
      Deprecated. 
      Copies the contents of src to dst.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public static boolean copy(java.io.File src,
                           java.io.File dst)
        Deprecated. 
        Copies the contents of src to dst.
        Parameters:
        src - The source file
        dst - The destination file
        Returns:
        true if the copy is successfully, false otherwise.
